entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a wizard who is being pursued by Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, also a wizard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and companion, also a witch.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are loyal to the Dark Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that feed on human happiness and can kill with a touch.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Another name for the Dark Lord.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters are pursuing Harry.
Ron is a friend of Harry's.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's.
The Death Eaters are loyal to the Dark Lord.
The Dark Lord and Voldemort are the same person.
